items.title: Scarcity of cooking gas persists in Lagos, Abuja, others
items.summary: DESPITE the  appeal by the minister of State Petroleum Resources (Gas), Honourable Ekperikpe Ekpo, urging  marketers, distributors, and all stakeholders along the LPG (cooking gas) value chain to desist from hoarding the product and refrain from exploiting consumers for profit, the product’s scarcity persist in Lagos, Abuja, Delta States, others. Besides, for the few available […]
